main event: A UFO sighting was reported by two witnesses in Ashby, Massachusetts on April 25, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as helicopter-shaped with fire or flame emitting from the tail section., The UFO swooped down to approximately 100 feet above the witnesses' vehicle, causing hysteria., The witnesses reported a bright bluish light dominating the object, although there was no sound as the vehicle was traveling at 40 M.P.H., Both the witnesses were considered reliable and conscientious individuals., The object was observed traveling westerly on route 31 from Fitchburg to Ashby.
sighted object: helicopter-shaped object with fire or flame
witness description: One witness was a school teacher in Leominster, and both were described as reliable and conscientious.
